author: Mariam Abdullahi
title: Edo APC Alleges Intimidation by Governor Obaseki, Petitions IG, Senate
text:
Expressing concerns over alleged intimidation and threats of arrest, the Edo State chapter of the All Progressives Congress has lodged a complaint against Governor Godwin Obaseki. The party has petitioned the Inspector-General of Police, Kayode Egbetokun; Senate Committee Chairman on Police Affairs, Abdulhamid Madori; and Chairman of the Police Service Commission, Hashimu Argungu regarding these issues.
This action has been taken with the state’s gubernatorial election scheduled to take place on September 21 drawing near.
In the petition submitted, Edo APC chairman, Jarrett Tenebe, pointed fingers at Obaseki, alleging that the governor is exploiting the state’s security apparatus to target party members. This move is seen as an attempt to weaken opposition parties and instill fear in the lead-up to the impending poll.
The petition included the following statement, “As the chairman of the All Progressives Congress, Edo state chapter, I wish to bring to your attention the alarming level of intimidation and harassment orchestrated by Governor Godwin Obaseki. While the Freedom of Information Act guarantees the right to question any government policies, the Governor appears uninterested in engaging with any opposition to his administration’s decisions.
“In a bid to squash dissent, he deploys all available security resources within the state, both official and unofficial, to carry out his vengeful actions. He has openly threatened severe consequences for anyone who challenges him, especially during this critical election period.
“In light of these events, he has mobilized the state’s police commissioner to pursue my arrest purely for political reasons. Reports from my party’s headquarters indicate that the police delivered a summons for me to meet with the police commissioner regarding a petition lodged against me by the governor in my absence.
“I have been made aware that the Governor has instructed the police to surround my party’s headquarters where we are set to inaugurate our campaign council tomorrow, all in an effort to arrest me for political gain. I humbly request your prompt intervention by transferring any related cases to your office for a thorough investigation. I trust in the integrity of your office to address this unwarranted harassment appropriately.”

author: @wilxTV
title: WEATHER EXTRA: Strong storms bring heavy rainfall
text: WEATHER EXTRA: Strong storms bring heavy rainfall LANSING, Mich. (WILX) - Widely scattered showers and thunderstorms will continue to pass over the area Friday afternoon. Any thunderstorm in the afternoon could produce localized heavy rainfall, but severe weather is not expected. High temperatures top out in the low to mid 80s and the humidity levels remain high. First Alert Chief Meteorologist Darrin Rockcole is live at the News 10+ Digital Desk with what you need to know. Join us during any of our livestreams on [YouTube ](https://www.youtube.com/@wilxtv)to chat with us LIVE! If you have questions or comments, ask away and we’ll see your questions in real time! Plus, you can find more stories and extras on our [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@wilxnews10)! author: Francesca Williams
title: Polegate homes remain without water following burst pipe
text:
Thousands of homes remain without water following a burst water main pipe. This morning, South East Water were alerted to the issue in the Polegate area.
Technicians were able to pinpoint the location of the burst and Lancing Way and Wannock Road were subsequently closed as repairs were made.
South East Water have since confirmed that the roads will remain closed overnight as teams work to resolve the issue.
Bottled water stations have been opened at Eastbourne Angling Club on Royal Parade.
These will remain open until 10.30pm and are available for those affected.
Teams will also be delivering water to those on the priority services register, as well as supporting care homes, hospitals, and…
Francesca Williams

author: HTL Grieskirchen
title: HTL Grieskirchen kürt junge IT-Talente: HTL Grieskirchen kürt junge IT-Talente: CHC 2025 mit Rekordpreisgeld und hochkarätigen Teilnehmern - Grieskirchen & Eferding
text:
Am 28. Mai wurde die HTL Grieskirchen erneut zur Bühne für außergewöhnliche IT-Leistungen: Beim zweiten Coding und Hacking Contest (CHC) traten alle Schülerinnen und Schüler der Schule in Teams gegeneinander an, um komplexe Aufgaben aus den Bereichen Softwareentwicklung und IT-Security zu lösen – in einem Wettbewerb, der Spannung, Anspruch und Teamgeist auf beeindruckende Weise vereinte.
Ein Novum in diesem Jahr: Erstmals nahmen auch ehemalige Absolventinnen und Absolventen teil – darunter sogar ein früherer Gewinner des renommierten ACSC (Austrian Cyber Security Challenge). Damit stieg nicht nur das technische Niveau, sondern auch die Inspiration für die derzeitigen Schülerinnen und Schüler, die sich mit erfahrenen Profis messen konnten.
Auch die Preise sorgten für Begeisterung! Dank starker Unterstützung durch die Hauptsponsoren lab73, den Förderverein bait und weitere Sponsoren aus Industrie und Wirtschaft wurde ein Preisgeld von insgesamt über 2.000 EUR vergeben. Die fünf besten Teams jedes Jahrgangs verteidigten dabei ihre Top-Platzierung vor Publikum im Live-Stream, begleitet von Interviews, Ranglisten-Spannung und spürbarem Wettkampffieber.
Die letzte Challenge blieb – trotz Höchstleistungen – nur ganz knapp ungelöst. Ein Beweis für die perfekte Ausbalancierung der Aufgaben. Veranstaltet wurde der Contest wieder von den Organisatoren des letzten Jahres, den unglaublich engagierten ehemaligen Schülern Florian Dekker (Coding), Maximilian Kammerer (Hacking), Jonas Voitl (Streaming) und Julian Zecher (Plattform). Sie sorgten erneut für eine professionelle Umsetzung und einen reibungslosen Ablauf mit Unterstützung des Filmteams der HTL Grieskirchen.
Mit dem CHC 2025 hat die HTL Grieskirchen erneut gezeigt, dass innerschulische Wettbewerbe nicht nur motivieren, sondern auch echte Exzellenz fördern – und Brücken zwischen schulischer Ausbildung und digitaler Spitzenleistung schlagen.

author: 问董秘
title: 投资者提问：公司人形机器人业务近期有没有进展，请展开详细回复，谢谢。_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
投资者提问：
公司人形 机器人 业务近期有没有进展，请展开详细回复，谢谢。
董秘回答( 领益智造 SZ002600)：
公司目前在人形机器人机加工结构件、核心零部件、关节等模组、整机组装与应用落地开发方面已都具备订单。在机器人领域，公司致力于成为全球头部具身智能硬件制造商，结合市场需求与技术发展路径，开发躯体结构件、伺服电机、驱动器、减速器等核心零部件及关节模组、高功率充电、散热等解决方案等，并拓展至本体代工与组装服务。
查看更多董秘问答>> 免责声明：本信息由新浪财经从公开信息中摘录，不构成任何投资建议；新浪财经不保证数据的准确性，内容仅供参考。
